name: The Guitar Workshop
description:
In “The Guitar Workshop” the player will meet Charlie, a guitar craftsman, who will walk them through the steps of how to make a guitar and make informed decisions along the way. Charlie will teach the player not only about the different types of materials used, but also their effects on the sound of the guitar. Through every step of the build the player will make decisions that will allow them to learn how to create a guitar that is best suited to their needs.

Many people dream of learning the guitar, but how cool would it be to build your own? The game will take place in Charlie’ workshop where Charlie will walk you through the process. As folk guitar music plays happily in the background the player will be immersed in a fun learning experience.

Player’s will enjoy the learning process as they excitedly see their guitar come to life. There’s always a satisfaction in building something yourself. The Guitar Workshop is a one of a kind gaming experience that allows musicians and non-musicians learn about all that goes into building an instrument.

The game will cover several learning objectives throughout the course of the play. The player will have to learn and understand all the information Charlie provides to them. They will have to apply that knowledge while analyzing and evaluating how their choices will affect the sound and use of their instrument. When all is said and done the player will have created a guitar that is personal and unique to them.
